name: Product Marketing: Competitive Replacement Playbook PRD

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Define the competitive replacement campaign: targeting, messaging, assets, and measurement.

sections.title: Targeting & Objections
sections.content: Target install base, common objections, migration blockers, and incentives.

sections.title: Assets & Offers
sections.content: Guides, calculators, migration tools, promos; social proof and references.

sections.title: Execution Plan
sections.content: Channels, SDR/email plays, webinars/events, partner co-marketing.

sections.title: Risks & Measurement
sections.content: Vendor response, legal, churn risk; KPIs and attribution.
